definition: proposal/draft resolution/motion (to be debated)/to propose a bill/to make a proposal
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid

sentences.english: The rebel lawmakers denounced his proposal as reckless.
sentences.chinese: 内讧的议员斥责他的提案不顾后果。
昨天他们批准了这项提案。

sentences.english: Similar proposals have failed in New York and Philadelphia .
sentences.chinese: 类似的提案在纽约和费城遭到否决。

sentences.english: So I said to members of the Wang Yongzheng, the proposal also must adhere to.
sentences.chinese: 所以我对王永正委员说，这个提案还要坚持提。

sentences.english: Would you consider accepting our counterproposal?
sentences.chinese: 你能考虑接受我们的反提案吗？

sentences.english: The speaker lit into the government for its tax bill.
sentences.chinese: 演讲者抨击了政府的税捐提案。

sentences.english: The proposal has "validated" and "legitimated" the city today, he said.
sentences.chinese: 他说，提案于今日生效并合法化。

sentences.english: The budget proposal must be agreed by the state legislature.
sentences.chinese: 该预算提案必须经州立法机关同意。

sentences.english: Interview and comments from the sponsors about the tournament and the format.
sentences.chinese: 接受采访时，有关比赛和格式的提案国的意见。

sentences.english: All the activities in the proposal plan should be completed.
sentences.chinese: 提案计划中的所有活动都必须完成。

sentences.english: Boards at all four companies recommended voting against the say-on-pay proposals.
sentences.chinese: 四家公司的董事会都建议投票否决该提案。

sentences.english: Proposals are the major carriers for the CPPCC to perform its basic roles.
sentences.chinese: 提案是人民政协履行基本职能的主要载体。

sentences.english: You can undertake a business proposal search at any time.
sentences.chinese: 您可随时搜索企业提案。

sentences.english: Do the experimental results allow you to evaluate the proposed technique?
sentences.chinese: 实验结果是否能让你评估所提案的技术？

sentences.english: Tyler checks out the proposals and throws out any bad ideas.
sentences.chinese: 泰勒会亲自过目所有提案，把不顺眼的扔出箱子。

sentences.english: The motion was advanced in order to embarrass  the progress of the bill.
sentences.chinese: 为了阻碍提案的通过，动议被提出了。
